text: The Plaxton Panorama is a double decker body of a coach, It has been made from 2018 to the present day by Plaxton. The Panorama body is built on the Volvo B11RLE chassis. The Panorama can have 87 seats with a toilet, or 91 seats without a toilet. == Operators == Most Panoramas were purchased by Stagecoach Group operators, with the Oxford Tube ordering thirty-four Panoramas. == References == == Other websites == *Brochure & Specifications Panorama Category:Coaches (bus)
title: Plaxton Panorama
